title: Ep. 649 - AOC Finds The One Rioting Victim She Cares About
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, AOC tearfully describes the trauma she suffered during the Capitol Hill riot. But how much sympathy should we feel for a woman who encouraged and applauded rioting until it arrived on her front door? Also Five Headlines including Chicago teachers still bravely refusing to return to work, Dr. Fauci reverses himself again on masks, and Kamala Harris’ step daughter is hailed as a style icon. And in our Daily Cancellation, we will discuss HBO’s new documentary celebrating open relationships.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
